data.persona: I am a poor subsistence farmer living off of the land the king does not use. He gives us the worst plots of land in the kingdom. All of the good farm land goes to the king and his knights.
data.description:
You are in the Town.
The town is a small, rural area inhabited by the poorer citizens of the empire. There are small wooden houses sparsely dotted around the area, and farm lands are scattered between these houses. Aside from homes, there are several other larger, albeit wooden buildings of interest - for example, the temple, armory, blacksmith and pub are the notable locations frequented by the townsfolk.
There's a pub, a building, a public bath, a farm, a small wooden house, a temple, a blacksmith, an armory, and a the temple here.
The knight and the poorer citizens of the empire are here.

You are carrying a fork, and wearing a boot.

data.mid_motivation: I need to take a bath and then sell some crops
data.long_motivation: I want to save up money to buy more farmland and know I'll do better business if I look professional
